name: Pigeons Aren't Real
description:
Become an operator of a pigeon drone and gather intel from the citizens! Complete tasks and don’t get caught! Discovery about you could have consequences!

Pigeon’s Aren’t Real is a 2.5D game for the PC platform. This game was created during GDS Jam 2020 in 48 hours. Theme of the Game Jam: Disinformation and Conspiracy Theories.

  • Controls:
         A and D: to move around.
         Space: to jump (press space multiple times to fly)
         E: to Interact
  • The Team (Desperatos -1):
          Lucie Gašparínová (Visuals & Game Design)
          Kourosh Riahidehkordi (Programmer  & Game Design)
